arts.ttl: Nottingham Forest 0-2 Man City: Player ratings as Cityzens reach FA Cup final
arts.sum: Rico Lewis got the Cityzens off to the perfect start, as he received Mateo Kovacic's pass on the edge of the Forest box and fired past Matz Sels to open the scoring not even two minutes into the contest. SUB: Anthony Elanga (46' for Danilo)

arts.ttl: Manchester City beat Nottingham Forest to reach third successive FA Cup final
arts.sum: Rico Lewis and Josko Gvardiol struck for Pep Guardiola’s men.

arts.ttl: Nottingham Forest vs. Man City confirmed lineups: Bold Kevin De Bruyne, Zach Abbott decisions made for FA Cup semi-final
arts.sum: Nottingham Forest and Manchester City confirm their starting lineups for this afternoon's FA Cup semi-final clash at Wembley Stadium.

arts.ttl: Nottingham Forest v Manchester City: FA Cup semi-final – live
arts.sum: FA Cup updates from 4.30pm BST kick-off at Wembley Live scoreboard | Read Football Daily | And mail Taha Hello, hello, hello and welcome to our coverage of another Wembley showdown. Yesterday was about the Eagles; who gets all the glory today? In one corner, Manchester City, their league monopoly over but the campaign picking up some momentum of late. They’ve made it to the last two FA Cup finals and a trophy to go with Champions League football would be a fine turnaround from where they were a few months ago. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Nottingham Forest vs Man City LIVE: FA Cup match stream, latest team news, lineups, TV, prediction
arts.sum: A huge clash at Wembley to decide who faces Crystal Palace in the final

arts.ttl: Nottingham Forest vs Man City: Preview, predictions and lineups
arts.sum: A thrilling FA Cup semi-final is in store on Sunday afternoon as seven-time winners Manchester City take on Nottingham Forest. After returning to winning ways in the Premier League on Monday night at Spurs, Forest are now aiming to reach the FA Cup final for the first time since 1991.

arts.ttl: FA Cup semi-finals: All you need to know for Forest v Man City
arts.sum: Football writer Ben Bloom picks out the key talking points and players ahead of Nottingham Forest v Manchester City, as one of them looks to join Crystal Palace in the FA Cup final following their 3-0 win against Aston Villa. The FA Cup semi-finals have a very unusual look this season, given they feature only one club that has lifted the trophy during the past 65 years — Manchester City .

arts.ttl: How to watch Nottingham Forest vs Man City for FREE: TV channel and live stream for FA Cup today
arts.sum: Winners will meet Crystal Palace in next month’s FA Cup final
